reviews: Edit: App is fixed and working again! Great!

very useful for field work, property assessments, even recreational hiking for those who are soil-aware. has all the look and feel of a desktop GIS, but with none of the tedium. A great app for many professionals, also for students and others studying soils.
Fantastic app to have when traveling in areas where you are unfamiliar with the soils. I love the quick links to the official series description and geographic extent map.
Very easy to use and as a professor, I appreciate how simple it is to teach students how to use the app and and soil.
I love this app, but the update will NOT install. Anyone else having that issue?
Awesome and thank god they dont mess with it. It helps as an archeologist.
A really good app but I'm suddenly unable to update.
Working on biodiversity project and this was very helpful.
